title: Drawing, "Southern End of Niagara Falls, with the Edge of Goat Island", March 20, 1856
medium: Black crayon, brush and white gouache on grayish paper
description:
Recto: Horizontal view of the American Falls in snow, shown from the northwest.
Verso:  Horzontal view at center right of the southern end of the American Falls with the edge of Goat Island, shown from beneath.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Southern End of Niagara Falls, with the Edge of Goat Island", March 20, 1856.
March 20, 1856. Black crayon, brush and white gouache on grayish paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-54-a.
